## Resilience and restoration
<hr>

**<span style="color:blue">Different elements of vulnerability</span>: The degree to which a species or system is susceptible to adverse effects of global change is a function of:**

<br/>
<div style="float: left; width: 75%;">

* **<span style="color:darkred">Exposure</span>: Likelihood system will experience a given stressor**
    + How big & quickly is the change occurring?
    + Are there lag effects? 
    + Is the system exposed or buffered?

<br/>

* **<span style="color:darkred">Sensitivity</span>: Degree the system will be impacted by a given stressor**
    + Is the system fragile or robust?
    + Are there highly specialized species or obligate interactions?

<br/>

* **<span style="color:darkred">Response</span>: Ability of a system to respond to a given stressor**
    + Which core responses do species exhibit?
    + Can communities reorganize into a new stable state?

</div>

<IMG STYLE="position:absolute; TOP:480px; LEFT:870px; WIDTH:200px; HEIGHT:200px" SRC="images/hammer.png">
